event.name: Sarah Hendren: What Can a Body do?
event.shortDescription: A fascinating and provocative new way of looking at the things we use and the spaces we inhabit, and a call to imagine a better-designed world for us all.

description.html: Sara Hendren is an artist, design researcher, writer, and professor at Olin College of Engineering. She is the author of What Can A Body Do? Join us as she discusses fascinating and provocative new ways of looking at the things we use and the spaces we inhabit, and a call to imagine a better-designed world for us all. We’ll also hear how it relates to design pedagogy and she’ll answer questions about the book.
